document_data.mainbody:
ere was a servant of the Knights of the Black Sword who lived in Caer-Dineval as of the late 15 century DR.
The young tiefling wanted free from their life as a servant but was incredibly fearful of their captor. Mere garnered a fair amount of knowledge about the cultish Knights, including their ties to Levistus, the layout of their personal keep, as well as the groups hatred of the local duergar.
Circa the , Mere was living in Bryn Shander when they were "found" by the fiendish cult leader Kadroth. The elder tiefling brought the young beggar to Caer-Dineval to act as his groups personal servant.
